front.title: JWS Clear Text JSON Signature Option (JWS/CT)

abstract.t: This document describes a method for extending the scope of the JSON Web Signature (JWS) standard, called JWS/CT. By combining the detached mode of JWS with the JSON Canonicalization Scheme (JCS), JWS/CT enables JSON objects to remain in the JSON format after being signed (aka "Clear Text" signing).
